mapper.select: SELECT BLOG_RSS_SEQ, AUTHOR, CATEGORY, TITLE, LINK, DESCRIPTION, PUB_DATE, USE_YN, REG_DATE, UPT_DATE FROM TB_BLOG_RSS ORDER BY PUB_DATE DESC

SELECT N.NOTICE_SEQ noticeSeq, N.TITLE title, N.CONTENT content, N.MAIN_VIEW_YN mainViewYn, N.REG_MNGR_ID regMngrId, N.REG_DATE regDate, N.UPT_MNGR_ID uptMngrId, N.UPT_DATE uptDate, F.FILE_URL fileUrl FROM TB_NOTICE N INNER JOIN TB_FILE F ON N.NOTICE_SEQ = F.POST_SEQ AND F.FILE_KIND = 'thumbnail' WHERE MAIN_VIEW_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY UPT_DATE DESC

SELECT R.MAIN_SLIDE_SEQ, R.SLIDE_DV, R.TOP_TEXT, R.MIDDLE_TEXT, R.BOTTOM_TEXT, R.RESERVATION_BTN_YN, R.MAINTENANCE_HISTORY_BTN_YN, R.MAIN_SLIDE_ORDER, R.REG_DATE, R.UPT_DATE, F.FILE_URL FROM TB_MAIN_SLIDE R LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_FILE F ON R.MAIN_SLIDE_SEQ = F.POST_SEQ ORDER BY R.MAIN_SLIDE_ORDER
